displayName.text: Boys and Girls Club of Harlem

formattedAddress: 521 W 145th St, New York, NY 10031, USA
adrFormatAddress: 521 W 145th St, New York, NY 10031-5101, USA

originalText.text: My son went here for three years, it is a amazing and safe place for our little ones. During one of the years Black Panther was released, they were all on Ellen meeting Chadwick Boseman, Christmas parties at Columbia University, they would travel to gymnastics and an art program on certain days.

text.text: My son went here for three years, it is a amazing and safe place for our little ones. During one of the years Black Panther was released, they were all on Ellen meeting Chadwick Boseman, Christmas parties at Columbia University, they would travel to gymnastics and an art program on certain days.

originalText.text: i really enjoyed the staff members and the organization overall for it activities and academic program. My daugther attend the boys and girls club of Harlem and she also enjoyed the activities. However, the only concern  was that my daughter felt left out.My daughter has a disability and kids didn't engage with her socially.  which made her feel left out majority of the time. In future, i hope the program develops a lesson plan on learning how to engage and accept  children with all disabilities so there will be less judgment and more fun for all.
